instructions:
Character Sheet for Warhammer 40k Rogue Trader pen & paper RPG originally published by Fantasy Flight Games (2009) now published by Cubicle 7.

* Sheet functions are described with INFO TOOLTIPS hover over fields and buttons to see them.

* For full documentation and latest updates visit [Rogue Trader Improved Wiki](https://wiki.roll20.net/Rogue_trader_improved) 

* If you have any feedback, send a private message to [Author Mago](https://app.roll20.net/users/986445/mago) 

* -Revision 7- March 2025
